title: Is That A Seal? No, It's A Man Who Collapsed In The Snow
teaser: In Nova Scotia, Gerald Whitman crashed his car in a blizzard. Charlie Parker was shoveling snow, and at first thought he saw a seal. He found Whitman face down and brought him inside to wait for help.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
